markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Demolition Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2030)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 76 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to an object or structure

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _demolition fulu_ allows a saboteur or excavator to be far away from the scene when demolition happens. The fulu crumbles to ash over 5 minutes to 8 hours, as you determine when you place the fulu. Once the duration ends, the fulu lowers the Hardness of the object it's affixed to by an amount equal to the fulu's level and then deals the listed damage to the object. A _demolition fulu_ serves as a hazard with a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) DC to detect it and [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC to disable it according to its type.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Demolition Fulu (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 76 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Sometimes called the _moth fulu_, good for destroying softer objects; 3d6 bludgeoning damage, DC 17.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Demolition Fulu (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 76 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 275 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Sometimes called the _termite fulu_, good for destroying wood objects; 6d6 bludgeoning damage, DC 28.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Demolition Fulu (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 76 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 2,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Sometimes called the _rust fulu_, good for destroying metal objects; 10d6 bludgeoning damage, DC 37.
name: Demolition Fulu
